post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, April 16
post.Content:
A quiet week this week.

  • Jens Deters has announced that MQTT.fx 1.7.0 is released.
  • Almas Baimagambetov has released an update to his FXGL (FX Game Library).
  • Carl Walker has posted about how to stringify a List with JavaFX binding.
